about_the_game:
🦆 WELCOME TO SUPERMARKET DUCK DASH! 🛒
A hilarious, physics-based shopping game where you play as a chaotic supermarket duck on a mission to knock as many items off the shelves as possible! Help grumpy old folks by collecting groceries—but with only your wings to grab them, things are bound to go wrong!

🎯 Your goal? Complete shopping lists, rack up the biggest score, and cause maximum supermarket destruction before time runs out!

🛍️ 3 Quacking Game Modes!

🔥 Arcade Mode – Help as many old customers as possible before the timer hits zero!
⚡ Speed Dash – One chance, one cart—get the highest receipt total in a single run!
💥 Destruction Mode – Forget the shopping list—knock EVERYTHING off the shelves before time runs out!

🦆 Features That Will Make You Quack!

✅ 125+ products to grab, fling, and smash!
✅ Ridiculous physics for maximum chaos!
✅ 3 quack buttons—because sometimes words aren’t enough!
✅ Spotty teenagers, grumpy old folks, and large fruit!
✅ Endless replayability—beat your best score and master the art of shopping destruction!

💰 How much money can YOU make before time runs out?

🚀 Wishlist now and join the supermarket madness!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 LTS
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 64 MB available space

name: Supermarket Duck Dash

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP, Vista, 7, 8/8.1, 10
  • Processor: 2.0 Ghz
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1Gb Video Memory, capable of OpenGL 3.0+ support (2.1 with ARB extensions acceptable)
  • Storage: 65 MB available space

short_description: 🦆 Hilarious physics-based shopping chaos! Take control of a mischievous duck and cause supermarket mayhem! Knock products off shelves, complete shopping lists for grumpy old folks, and rack up the biggest receipt. 125+ products, wacky physics, and 3 chaotic game modes! How much can you earn?
